mapper.select: SELECT COMT_ID, CSP_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, C_DATE FROM COMMENTS WHERE CSP_ID = #{arg0} ORDER BY COMT_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS ( COMT_ID, CSP_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(comt_id),0)+1 FROM COMMENTS), #{csp_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
